name: The Plunge
description:
Game made for the MoonMoon Game Jam 2022 H2 by team Some Thoughts, Head Mostly Empty.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Space - attack
arrows - aim
Space (during dialogue) - skip to end of dialogue, or skip to next dialogue

Team:

tactical_fluke - Programming
SSCoconutz - Music
prodirus - Programming, Level Design
QiiVa - Art
